## Table: Bias in Relative Risk with $P_V^*$ = 0.50$ and true $RR = 0.25$:
```{r}

library(magrittr)
library(pander)

`p(L|V*E*)` = `p(V*|V)` = c(.5, .75, .9, 1)

tab1  = expand_grid(
  `p(V*)` = 0.5,
  RR = 0.25,
  r_V = c(.5, .75, .9, 1),
  P_L = `p(V*|V)`)

tab1 %<>%
  bind_cols(
    tab1 %$% reporting_multiplier(`p(V*)` = `p(V*)`, R = RR, `p(V*|V)` = r_V, `p(L|V*E*)` = P_L))

pander(tab1)

library(readr)
write_csv(tab1, "inst/extdata/table1.csv")

```
